channel.title: Banned for multi login?
channel.description: lets say im on 2 accounts and not macroing on 1 computer? can i get detected and banned?[br][size=1]Posted at: August 28, 2006, 12:42:49 PM[/size][hr]or do I need to get reported for multi login? can jagex detect me?

item.title: Banned for multi login?
item.dc:creator: @sam_cm sam cm
item.description:
@sam_cm wrote:

Can you play on same world with that batch thing?

Read full topic

item.title: Banned for multi login?
item.dc:creator: @jamie123 jamie123
item.description:
@jamie123 wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:4, topic:11433”]its not done by IPS, for all they know you could be an inetrnet café, its all to do with UID.dat
just delete it and you be fine

put this in batch file:

@echo off
pause
del "C:\WINDOWS.32_File_Store\uid.dat
pause[/quote]
cna u explain what u mean by batch file n stuff

Read full topic

item.title: Banned for multi login?
item.dc:creator: @JukuG JukuG
item.description:
@JukuG wrote:

[quote=“Pie 0wnz, post:9, topic:11433”][quote author=JukuG link=topic=17003.msg204170#msg204170 date=1157095771]

u multi log in jagex will know trust me

I dubble log every day for 5 months, no ban yet.

I used to double log all the time for pking and muling, and nothing happened.
[/quote]

Fishing guld + CW = ownage[/quote]

Haven’t tried that before.

I mule like hell when I mine.

Read full topic

item.title: Banned for multi login?
item.dc:creator: @future13 future13
item.description:
@future13 wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:4, topic:11433”]its not done by IPS, for all they know you could be an inetrnet café, its all to do with UID.dat
just delete it and you be fine

put this in batch file:

@echo off
pause
del "C:\WINDOWS.32_File_Store\uid.dat
pause[/quote]

hi umm im new to this…lol so can you explain to me properly on what to do?
i mean, how do i delete the uid.file?
and what happens if i do? does it effect my computer?

also what do i do with this:
@echo off
pause
del "C:\WINDOWS.32_File_Store\uid.dat
pause

thanx

Read full topic

item.title: Banned for multi login?
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

its not done by IPS, for all they know you could be an inetrnet café, its all to do with UID.dat
just delete it and you be fine

put this in batch file:

@echo off
pause
del "C:\WINDOWS.32_File_Store\uid.dat
pause

item.title: Banned for multi login?
item.dc:creator: @Drunk_On_Java Drunk On Java
item.description:
@Drunk_On_Java wrote:

Jagex IP logs accounts if they are macroing or being suspesious. Then they search their database for the same ip to see if you have multiple accounts and how close their actions have been.

Read full topic
